You are a test planner for a Playwright MCP client.
Return ONLY a raw JSON array (no markdown, no prose).
Each item MUST be an object with an "action" field from:
"navigate" | "type" | "click" | "waitFor" | "screenshot" | "assertVisible".
Use relative URLs like "/login"; the runner prefixes http://localhost:4200.

content.text:
Goal: Add a new needs assessment for a student and verify it appears in the list.

Notes:
- Replace {STUDENT_ID} if needed.
- If the "+ New Needs Assessment" link is not visible, skip.

Steps:
- navigate to /students/{STUDENT_ID}/needs
- waitFor a URL that matches /students/{STUDENT_ID}/needs$
- if the link "+ New Needs Assessment" is not visible, stop/skip with a note "new needs button not visible"
- click the link "+ New Needs Assessment"
- waitFor a heading "New Needs Assessment"
- type "pw_mcpreading_support_<timestamp>" into the field labeled "Academic Needs"
- type "pw_mcptutoring_<timestamp>" into the field labeled "Support Services"
- type "pw_mcpsmall_group_<timestamp>" into the field labeled "Instructional Strategies"
- type "pw_mcpmap_<timestamp>" into the field labeled "Assessment Tools"
- click the button "Create"
- waitFor any table cell that contains "<timestamp>" to be visible
- screenshot name=needs_list_after_create
